overview: A premier horse trainer in the west of Ireland is beset by tragedy, loses everything he cherishes, and almost forgets to live. Into his life comes a teenage refugee who has fled her own horrors and now finds herself in a confounding new world. Their only connection to themselves, and ultimately to their own hearts, is a horse called Allabelle, who is about to prove that they may all have one race left inside of them.
title: The Trainer
